pages.text: This butterfly can only be found on the $(#DD0000)rare mushroom islands$(). A player can lure the Shroom Skipper towards them using $(#DD0000)red mushrooms$(). When put into a bottle, the Shroom Skipper will occationally $(#DD0000)turn brown to red mushrooms around it.$()
pages.title: Shroom Skipper

pages.wings_caption: The wings of the shroom skipper can be used as $(#DD0000)replacement for red mushrooms$() in mushroom soup
pages.butterfly_caption: The anatomy of this butterfly suggests its a part of the fungus itself
